vote.title: An  ordinance amending Sections 2-142,  2-143,  2-152.4,  2-175, 2-176, and 2-177 of Chapter 2, �Administration�; amending Sections 13-7, 13-9, 13-10, and 13-11 of Chapter 13, �Courts, Fines, and Imprisonments�; amending Sections 20A-24 and 20A-31 of Chapter 20A, �Fair Housing and Mixed Income Housing�; amending Section 51-4.217 of Chapter 51, �Dallas Development Code: Ordinance No. 10962, as amended�; amending Sections 51A-4.217, 51A-4.908, 51A-4.909, 51A-4.1002, and 51A-4.110 of Chapter 51A, �Dallas Development Code: Ordinance No. 19455, as amended�; (1) changing the name of the Department of Housing and Community Development to the Department of Housing and Community Empowerment; (2) changing the name of the Department of Dallas Municipal Court to the Department of Municipal Court and Detention Services; (3) transferring the Office of the City Marshal to the Department of Municipal Court and Detention Services; (4) providing  a  penalty not to exceed $2,000; (5) providing a saving clause; (6) providing a  severability clause; and (7) providing an effective date. - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
